items.title: Fundstrat’s Tom Lee Predicts Ethereum Likely To Hit Bottom This Week
items.description: Lee said Ethereum’s valuation metrics, like assets locked on-chain and long-term ratios to Bitcoin, indicate it may be nearing a bottom.

items.title: Why Did Nuvalent Stock Surge 15% Today?
items.description: The company announced strong topline results from its ALKOVE-1 Phase 1/2 trial, evaluating its investigational drug Neladalkib.
